pages.text: The Create Mod is an engineering marvel that brings machinery to Minecraft like never before. $(br2)Harness rotational power to automate tasks, build complex contraptions, and create stunning structures. $(br2)With belts, gears, pulleys, and more, Create gives you the tools to turn your imagination into reality.

To get started, gather Andesite Alloy, the building block for many components. $(br2)Combine it with wood and stone to craft basic machines like the Mechanical Press and Millstone. $(br2)Generate rotational power with Water Wheels or Windmills, then distribute it using shafts and gearboxes.

With Create, you can build magnificent factories, automate farming, or construct elaborate roller coasters. $(br2)Transport items using conveyor belts and trains, and move large structures with the Mechanical Bearing. $(br2)The possibilities are endless -- start small and dream big!
